subject: Re: [junit] is there an easy way to spawn multiple threads?
msgSnippet: ... Somewhere there is a ThreadedTestCase. Maybe in JUnitPerf? Search the web. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com
messageBody:
ymidt wrote:

> is there an easy way to spawn multiple threads to run a junit test in
> multiple threads simultaneously?

Somewhere there is a ThreadedTestCase. Maybe in JUnitPerf? Search the web.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
